mapper.select: SELECT m_store.*, m_city.province, m_city.city, m_type.main_type, m_type.type_name FROM m_store JOIN m_city ON (m_store.city_id = m_city.id) JOIN m_type ON (m_type.id = m_store.type_id) WHERE 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO m_store (store_name, store_img, city_id, type_id) VALUES (#{store_name}, #{store_img}, #{city_id}, #{type_id});
